qas.question: To what branch of Gallo-Romance languages is Catalan attributed?
Who disagrees with putting Catalan in the Occitano-Romance branch?
What kind of linguists do not like placing Catalan in the Occitano-Romance category?

context: The ascription of Catalan to the <a0_0>Occitano-Romance<a0_0/> branch of Gallo-Romance languages is not shared by all <a1_0>linguists<a1_0/> and philologists, particularly among <a2_0>Spanish ones<a2_0/>, such as Ramón Menéndez Pidal.
